item.title: 'He's already unlocked things': Why the Magic needed Desmond Bane
item.description: Orlando is hoping its all-in approach for Desmond Bane will help stars Paolo Banchero and Franz Wagner win a championship.

item.title: Fixing the Mavs: Why there's no cure-all for this Dallas disaster
item.description: Can this mess be fixed? Our NBA insiders are breaking down the Mavs' options amid a tumultuous 4-10 start.

item.title: Statement Uruguay win shows the USMNT has come a long way in 16 months
item.description: Sixteen months ago, the U.S. men's national team hit rock bottom, losing 1-0 to Uruguay to seal its group-stage elimination from the 2024 Copa America...

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona's Lewandowski wanted by AC Milan
item.description: AC Milan have made veteran Barcelona striker Robert Lewandowski a target. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.
